name: Bloody Maniac
text:
Dragonform (Whenever this creature attacks, if defending player's life total is less than half its starting life total, this creature gets +1/+1 and flying until end of turn.)
Whenever Bloody Maniac attacks, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, Bloody Maniac gets +3/+0 until end of turn. If the sacrificed creature was red, it also gains trample until end of turn.
